reviewText: The information is good. The film has problems for those who do not understand German and Italian. The animated speakers, Mendelssohn and Wagner, are not helpful.
What a waste of money! A warning should have been given that the majority of narration and interviews are not in English.

This was an interesting documentary - but I was hoping for so much more. I was a little tacky with letters read by people such as Wagner with an animated painted Wagner talking. Really odd. It was informative, but I was expecting my mind to be blown with a revelation of this composer who is significantly underrated. Interesting, informative... but only 60 minutes. MENDELSSOHN IS WORTH HOURS MORE!
